nodes.text: Mupin XII was a location. General Jan Dodonna of the Rebel Alliance scanned a number of locations, including Mupin XII, to determine a potential site for a new rebel base prior to his death in 1 ABY. After Dodonna's death, the rebels Leia Organa, Luke Skywalker, and Han Solo were sent on a reconnaissance mission to the locations scanned by Dodonna. Upon reading the list of sites they were required to investigate, Solo was skeptical that Mupin XII was a real location.
Mupin XII was mentioned in Star Wars 67, a comic written by Kieron Gillen and published by Marvel Comics on June 19, 2019.
